pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zero-One (2019, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Jin's $(l:zero_one/devices/forceriser_jin)MetsubouJinrai Forceriser (Jin)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Zero-One's $(l:zero_one/riders/zero_one#flying_falcon)Flying Falcon$(/l) form
